@graph.title: Modern oxidation methods
@graph.abstract: Front Matter -- Recent Developments in Metal-Catalyzed Dihydroxylation of Alkenes / Man Kin Tse, Kristin Schr̲der, Matthias Beller -- Transition Metal-Catalyzed Epoxidation of Alkenes / Hans Adolfsson -- Organocatalytic Oxidation. Ketone-Catalyzed Asymmetric Epoxidation of Alkenes and Synthetic Applications / Yian Shi -- Catalytic Oxidations with Hydrogen Peroxide in Fluorinated Alcohol Solvents / Albrecht Berkessel -- Modern Oxidation of Alcohols Using Environmentally Benign Oxidants / Isabel W C E Arends, Roger A Sheldon -- Aerobic Oxidations and Related Reactions Catalyzed by -Hydroxyphthalimide / Yasutaka Ishii, Satoshi Sakaguchi, Yasushi Obora -- Ruthenium-Catalyzed Oxidation for Organic Synthesis / Shun-Ichi Murahashi, Naruyoshi Komiya -- Selective Oxidation of Amines and Sulfides / Jan-E Backvall -- Liquid Phase Oxidation Reactions Catalyzed by Polyoxometalates / Ronny Neumann -- Oxidation of Carbonyl Compounds / Eric V Johnston, Jan-E Backvall -- Manganese-Catalyzed Oxidation with Hydrogen Peroxide / Wesley R Browne, Johannes W de Boer, Dirk Pijper, Jelle Brinksma, Ronald Hage, Ben L Feringa -- Biooxidation with Cytochrome P450 Monooxygenases / Marco Girhard, Vlada B Urlacher -- Index
